title: Is Gravel Racing as We Know It Over? | Velo Podcast
content:
Law enforcement is requiring SBT GRVL to hold a much smaller event for 2025 with a drastically changed race format. The ramifications for all gravel events could be huge.

Read the full article at Is Gravel Racing as We Know It Over? | Velo Podcast on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
